pycm documentation

pycm.charts package

Contents

pycm.charts package¶

Submodules¶

pycm.charts.applemusic module¶

pycm.charts.applemusic.albums(date, country='US', genre='All Genres')¶

Query the charts/apple_music/albums endpoint for the given date.

Parameters:
  • date – string date in ISO format %Y-%m-%y
  • country – string country code, e.g. ‘US’
Genre:

string genre (see CM docs)
Returns:

list of dictionary of apple music chart data
pycm.charts.applemusic.tracks(date, country='US', genre='All Genres')¶

Query the charts/apple_music/tracks endpoint for the given date.

Parameters:
  • date – string date in ISO format %Y-%m-%y
  • country – string country code, e.g. ‘US’
Genre:

string genre (see CM docs)
Returns:

list of dictionary of apple music chart data
pycm.charts.applemusic.videos(date, country='US', genre='All Genres')¶

Query the charts/apple_music/videos endpoint for the given date.

Parameters:
  • date – string date in ISO format %Y-%m-%y
  • country – string country code, e.g. ‘US’
Genre:

string genre (see CM docs)
Returns:

list of dictionary of apple music chart data

pycm.charts.beatport module¶

pycm.charts.beatport.tracks(date)¶

Query the charts/beatport/tracks endpoint for the given date.

Parameters:date – string date in ISO format %Y-%m-%y
Returns:list of dictionary of Soundcloud chart data

pycm.charts.shazam module¶

pycm.charts.shazam.tracks(date, country='US')¶

pycm.charts.soundcloud module¶

pycm.charts.soundcloud.tracks(date, country='US', kind='top', genre='all-music')¶

Query the charts/soundcloud/tracks endpoint for the given date.

Parameters:
  • date – string date in ISO format %Y-%m-%y
  • country – string country code, e.g. ‘US’
  • kind – string ‘top’ or ‘trending’
  • genre – string genre (see CM docs)
Returns:

list of dictionary of Soundcloud chart data

pycm.charts.spotify module¶

Defines methods for obtaining Spotify chart data from the chartmetric.com API.

pycm.charts.spotify.freshfind(date)¶

Query the charts/spotify/freshfind endpoint for the given date.

Parameters:date – string date in ISO format %Y-%m-%y
Returns:list of dictionary of spotify chart data
pycm.charts.spotify.tracks(date, country='US', viral=False)¶

Query the charts/spotify/tracks endpoint for the given date.

Parameters:date – string date in ISO format %Y-%m-%y
Returns:list of dictionary of spotify chart data
